facilities.name: Choa Chu Kang Columbarium
facilities.description: The Choa Chu Kang Columbarium is located within the Choa Chu Kang Cemetery Complex, in Singapore and operated by the National Environment Agency. It houses some 147,000 niches spread over 18 four-storey blocks.

facilities.name: Mount Vernon Columbarium
facilities.description: Mount Vernon Columbarium was a columbarium complex on Mount Vernon, Singapore. Built in 1962 as a crematorium, the columbarium closed in 2018 to make way for future redevelopments in the upcoming Bidadari housing estate, with plans for a new funeral parlour complex to be completed by 2025.

facilities.name: The Yishun Columbarium
facilities.description: The Yishun Columbarium houses some 16,000 niches and has an architecture similar to a Chinese temple, which offers families a choice of a more traditional temple-like environment.
